body:
why do new lines not work in comments? how hard is to code a nl2br dammit,

next you'll tell me you don't even strip html

i can't read squat japanese and still am disappointed
yea its a long story but its almost never the same girl twice so its like a ton of different stories
the cover being repeated every chapter reminding me of the first girl when we only see her do one cameo around page 300 is very annoying, in the end she's no main girl or anything. should'a put the statue or goddes or something else on the cover to not be so misleading...

even if ruri's right and his rapes end up "good" in some way, it's still awful to do it and figure that out after the fact

ruri888, thank you for the summary, even tho i guess i don't like the story i appreciate your post explaining it.
can't believe a story this long flew under my radar
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i am not sorry
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
Now I wasted 4 hours reading this masterpiece :dorime:

The summary: He has been living without any interest or passion in his life, not even to his ex(s). He's been searching for a job but always ended up with bad impression because they thought he's lack of motivation. Just when he's at limit because he doesn't know why himself is become like this, he found a Shrine at the middle of nowhere, rant up into it, and kick it. Turn out it's a Shrine of Fertilization/Birth Goddess, and he ended up got a curse to get boner as soon as he see any circumstances woman→which....at first, it looks like a total rape-crime, but actually each of the woman who's "make the curse to be activated" has their own problems (either they are in urge of sex-stress, low self confident, a bitch, a perv, or else). The curse will much torment him if he doesn't follow his sexual desire, yet it's only has one-time effect (so he won't get a "boner curse" at the same woman).
wait did he kick the statue or did some mysterious leg come in and kick it?
I need more of these btw
